Welcome aboard !
I am AFirst of all, move with WASD to the table.

Equip the clothes on the table by getting it with left click,
and equipping it with E."

To take less place in your inventory, you can insert your PDA in your Identification Card by selectionning the latter and clicking on the former !
You can also switch hands with the key X.

It's so dark ! I might lose sight of you, but you can't always interact and especially pull me by right clicking me and chose your action.
You can also toggle the light integrated on your PDA, like a messiah apporting a light bulb on a dark world, thrilling isn't it ?
No?
Well, I can't understand the thrill either, I am a robot after all.
My sensor detect an irregular amount of toxic CO2 in the left room. Equip the mask and the oxygen stocked in the bag, and don't forget to turn your oxygen on !

Be careful, there is a hole in the floor on the next room. You need to be ready : equip the space suit to protect yourself from the harsh environment, and use the item in this room to repare the hole by using the rod on the empty space, then use floor tile on the scaffold to build a base tile and lastly use the last one to finish the floor tile !

Congratulation on completing your first mission !
you can rest, eat and drink here, just click on the machines and see what they give you !"

This is the Firearm Training Ground, you can train your aim and the guns here.
Remember to not waste your ammo in real situation !"

This is a medbay, where you can heal your wounds here.
There should be medical care inside the kit !"

Look at this room ! Here you can farm food, that are essential to survival !
Take a seed from the Mega Seed Servitor, plant it in the Hydroponics Tray and wait for it to grow !
You can water use the bucket to add or remove water, the Spade to dig and move dirt, and the Cultivator to remove weeds.
When the plant has grow, you can take them and not only eat them, but you can also put one in the Seed Extractor to extract information from the seed !

It seem like you can leave this place here.
Thank you for coming, and good luck for your future missions, {PlayerList.Instance.InGamePlayers[0].Name} !"
